data.name: YouNeedToUpdate
data.value: I think you need to update...

data.name: FailedToGetUpdate
data.value: Failed to get Update info, can't connent to 'github.com', check your internet connection or proxy configuration.

data.name: UseSpecificLayoutChangingByLeftRightCTRLS
data.value: Use specific layout changing by Left/Right CTRLS

data.name: MahouAMagicalLayoutSwitcher
data.value: Mahou (魔法) A magical layout switcher.

data.name: HighlightScrollLockWhenLanguage1IsActive
data.value: Highlight ScrollLock when language 1 is active.

data.name: EnableCheckForUpdatesAtStartup
data.value: Enable check for updates at startup.

data.name: WhileThisOptionEnabled
data.value: While this option enabled, [Convert word] and [Convert line] and [Convert selection with "CS-Switch" enabled] will just cycle between all locales instead of switching between selected in settings. This mode works for almost all programs. If there is program in which [Convert word] or [Convert line] or [Convert selection with "CS-Switch" enabled] not work, try with this option enabled. If you have just 2 layouts(input languages) it is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED to turn it ON, and "Emu" too to ON.

data.name: HotkeyForConvertWordPress
data.value: This is current hotkey for "Convert word". Press any key to assign it, or key with modifiers(ALT,CTRL,SHIFT).

data.name: HotkeyForConvertSelectionPress
data.value: This is current hotkey for "Convert selection". Press any key to assign it, or key with modifiers(ALT,CTRL,SHIFT).

data.name: HotkeyForConvertLinePress
data.value: This is current hotkey for "Convert line". Press any key to assign it, or key with modifiers(ALT,CTRL,SHIFT)

data.name: GoToGitHubRepositoryToViewSourceOrReportIssue
data.value: Go to GitHub repository to view source or report issue.

data.name: TogglesVisibilityOfIconInATray
data.value: Toggles visibility of icon in a tray. If it is hidden, to show configs window hit CTRL+ALT+SHIFT+INSERT or just run Mahou.exe again.

data.name: CheckForUpdatesAndUpdateIfNeeded
data.value: Check for updates, and update if needed.

data.name: BlocksHotkeysThatUseControl
data.value: Blocks hotkeys that use Control, when "Switch layout by key" is set to Left/Right Control.

data.name: SwitchingLayoutDependsOnCycleModeEmuOptions
data.value: Switching layout depends on "Cycle Mode" and "Emu" options

data.name: CycleModeWillUseEmulationOf
data.value: If this option enabled, Cycle Mode will use Emulation of Alt+Shift/Win+Space instead "sending window message" that changes layout.

data.name: CovertSelectionUseLayoutSwitching
data.value: If this option enabled, Covert selection will use layout switching. All characters will be rewriten as they must.(no problems with symbols There also an CS-Switch+ in More Configs page 2.

data.name: OnlyWorksWhenCycleModeIsOFF
data.value: Only works when Cycle Mode is OFF.

data.name: ModifiersWillBeRepressed
data.value: If enabled, modifiers will be repressed after conversion. Due to new hotkey managment modifiers NEVER stuck(recommenden).

data.name: PressingONESpace
data.value: If enabled, pressing ONE space AFTER word will not clear last word.

data.name: EnablingThisWillReselectText
data.value: Enabling this, will reselect text after "Convert selection".

data.name: SelectTypeForEmulateChangeLayout
data.value: Select type for Emulate change layout. Win+Space works only in Windows 10!! Win+Space also will work better in Metro apps.

data.name: PressingLCtrlWillSwitchLayout
data.value: Pressing LCtrl will switch layout to selected.

data.name: PressingRCtrlWillSwitchLayout
data.value: Pressing RCtrl will switch layout to selected.

data.name: EnablingThisWillDisable
data.value: Enabling this will disable LCtrl/RCtrl from "Switch layout by key". While this enabled pressing LCtrl/RCtrl will switch to specified layout.

data.name: SymbolsWillBeIgnored
data.value: If enabled, symbols []{};':",./<>"? will be ignored and will not be converted. Works in Convert word, Convert line, Convert selection with Cylce Mode and CS-Switch enabled. Won't work if you have >2 layouts an Cycle Mode enabled!

data.name: EnablesMoreTriesToGetSelectedTextInConvertSelection
data.value: Enables more tries to get selected text in Convert selection.

data.name: MouseCursorHoversTextItWillDisplayASmallTipOfWhatLangaugeIsNowUsing
data.value: If enabled, mouse cursor hovers text it will display a small tip of what langauge is now using.

data.name: SpeedOfCheckingCursorTypeifItEqualsI
data.value: Speed of checking cursor type.(if it equals "I" )

data.name: ColorsAndFontOfSmallTipLeftForegroundRightBackground
data.value: Colors and font of small tip.(Left - foreground, Right - background)

data.name: EnablesDoubleHotkeyAbility
data.value: Enables double hotkey ability, and makes it possible to set modifies to hotkey.

data.name: TimeToWaitSecondHotkeyPressms
data.value: Time to wait second hotkey press(ms)

data.name: CombinesSomeAbilities
data.value: Combines some abilities of Convert selection with enabled CS-Switch and when it disabled.(Enable CS-Switch for it to work) It can: 1.Conversion from multiple languages at once. 2.Ignore symbols feature work in it. 3.Auto get language of text(not all symbols(the ones that exist in both layouts) can be rightly recognized if wrong layout selected from begin) 4.Ability to convert symbols that exist in both layouts different if change layout before conversion.

data.name: MakesBackgroundOfLanguage
data.value: Makes background of language tooltip transparent. Don't forget to change text color.(because "White" is default) Some fonts may look bad, try changing to another.("Georgia" or "Palatino Linotype" is recommend)

data.name: PressingSpace
data.value: If this enabled, pressing Space will expand small (which starts with "->") word, to big (which is between "====>" and "<====") word/text fragment.

data.name: DisplayLanguageTooltip
data.value: Display language tooltip only on layout change. Time of displaying is 7x[Refresh rate].

data.name: HighlightScrollLock
data.value: Highlight Scroll Lock when active language 1, selected in main window.

data.name: CheckForUpdatesTooltip
data.value: If enabled Mahou will check for updates at startup.

data.name: AllowToConvertSpecificLastWord
data.value: Allow to convert specific last word count by pressing hotkey and then 1-9 on keyboard.

data.name: DesignedONLYToSearchForErrors
data.value: Designed ONLY to search for errors, logs are saved in Mahou's folder, in folder Logs.

data.name: CommonToolTop
data.value:
Press Pause(by Default) to convert last inputted word. Press Scroll(by Default) while selected text is focused to convert it. Press Shift+Pause(by Default) to convert last inputted line. Press Ctrl+Alt+Shift+Insert to show Mahou main window. Press Ctrl+Alt+Shift+F12 to shutdown Mahou.
*Note that if you typing in not of selected in settings layouts(locales/languages), conversion will switch typed text to Language 1(Ignored if Cycle Mode is ON).
**If you have problems with symbols conversion(selection) try "switching languages (1=>2 & 2=>1)" or "CS-Switch" option.
Hover on any control of main window for more info about it.
************WINDOWS 10 USERS WHO USE METRO APPS************ Enable "Cycle Mode", "Emu" and set Emu type to "Win+Space" these settings work better for Metro apps.
To reset settings just delete Mahou.ini in Mahou folder.
Regards.

data.name: YouHaveAssignedSameHotkeys
data.value: You have assigned same hotkeys for Convert word & Convert line, that is impossible!!

data.name: PressedModifiersForConvertWordHotkey
data.value: You have pressed just modifiers for Convert word hotkey!!

data.name: PressedModifiersForConvertSelectionHotkey
data.value: You have pressed just modifiers for Convert selection hotkey!!

data.name: YouHavePressedJustModifiersForConvertLineHotkey
data.value: You have pressed just modifiers for Convert line hotkey!!

data.name: YouHaveRemovedSelectedLocalesReselect
data.value: You have removed selected locales, reselect.

data.name: UsingCapsLockProduceIssues
data.value: Using CapsLock with CapsLock assigned as [Switch Only Key] will produce issues, disable [Switch Only Key] feature or assign it to another key.

data.name: LoggingDisabled
data.value: Logging disabled due to 10+ logging errors, last error:
